title: Fix memory leaks from intervals and localStorage
body:
## Changes

- Added proper interval cleanup with `clearInterval()`
- Created `stopAutoRefresh()` function to clean up intervals
- Fixed localStorage not being cleared on logout

## Testing

Tested logout flow and verified intervals are properly cleaned up.

## Issues Still Remaining

- Event listeners still not cleaned up (memory leak)
- Multiple duplicate event listeners added on page load
- API keys still exposed in code
- Global variable pollution continues
head: fix-memory-leaks
